title: Mervin Factor – An open letter to President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Dr Edward Perera (Pix by Sirasa TV) An open letter to His Excellency President Mahinda Rajapaksha by Dr. Edward Perera, The Chairman of Hela Abhimana Foundation in Germany. How dares he to perform acrobatic feats, where the wise avert to intrude on Your Excellency President, Let me draw your kind attention…
